results.content: Great course.  Highly focused class on integrating Stripe in a real world setting of building a functional e-commerce site.  You will learn about a lot about integrating Stripe into your app.  The instructor was very clear with great details.

results.content: Great overview of the Stripe API which helped to introduce much of the needed functionality to configure payments for a web application. Very helpful to contextualize the process before jumping into the setup for my project!
results.content_html: Great overview of the Stripe API which helped to introduce much of the needed functionality to configure payments for a web application. Very helpful to contextualize the process before jumping into the setup for my project!

results.content:
Abdi's course is exactly what I needed.

I was going through YouTube videos to understand how to add Stripe to my MERN app, but they either had dated info or -- most commonly -- were narrow in their content, skipping over important topics.

Abdi goes over the material stem-to-stern, front-end and back-, in a thorough manner in easy-to-follow steps.

The bottom-line for me: I now know more than the basics, can confidently add Stripe to my app, and have a foundation for going deeper, if I need to.

And I'll be looking for other courses that Abdi offers.

results.content:
The course is amazing, I was expecting that he could use the cloud functions in firebase or the extension of Stripe in firebase, but in general, when he is programming, he explains you about the code, where the code come from, and what is the purpose of.

The course was superb!

results.content: The course delivers as expected. Some React knowledge is absolutely required, as specified in the description, or you will be completely lost. a walk through on deployment would have been great but you should be able to figure it out.
